New Records: David Miller scored a match-winning 59 from 46 deliveries
Key Match Events: India were 23 without loss before Lungi Ngidi caught and bowled Rohit Sharma
India slid to 49 for five after Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's dismissal
Yadav led India's recovery, scoring 68 off 40
Aiden Markram was crucially dropped by Virat Kohli in the 12th over
Markram made 52 from 41 before being caught by Suryakumar Yadav
David Miller continued the charge for South Africa, scoring a boundary from the third ball of the final over
Miller followed it up with a second four to win the game and secure a five-wicket win for his side
Yadav top-edged a Wayne Parnell delivery to Keshav Maharaj
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa delivered an impressive bowling performance to limit India to a well-below par total of 133
